data.title: Committees & Task Forces
data.meta_description: Wellesley College, one of the most excellent institutions of higher education in the country and widely acknowledged as the nation's top college for women, provides its 2,300 students with opportunities that prepare them to realize their own highest ambitions and compete in any setting.
data.text:
